website_summaries.verdict: A near-silent, steady laptop with easy storage upgrade options.
pros: Unless you're doing some heavy gaming, the Dell's fan runs pretty quietly
This model comes with a fingerprint scanner and a sturdy keyboard that's nice to type on
Also comes with 8 gigabytes of memory, a 128-gigabyte SSD and 1-terabyte HDD
cons: This model is on the bulkier side, and can take longer to charge

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Screen is great
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Screen is great, boots fast. Despite being advertised with 8Gb of RAM, mine came with 16. The NVidia 1060 plays the most demanding games with great fps rates. No flickr, no lag. The wireless card is excellent. I have Spectrum 100Mb internet, and there is very little dropoff from ethernet to wifi. I consistenly acheive 100Mb on wifi, and about 110-115 on ethernet. The wifi connection is rock solid, which may be due in part to the Motorola MG 7315 Wifi Modem I have. So far, this machine has performed flawlessly for me. The build quality is excellent. For the price, I don't believe you can find a more well-configured machine.
customer_reviews.author: Kope Kapuna

customer_reviews.title: Great package for the price....still
customer_reviews.text: Fast overall, good graphics performance. Upgraded the memory and replaced the HDD with a SSD, one screw to remove and the bottom comes off. The memory and hard drive are easily accessible, the replacements took about 15 minutes to install. Overall, very satisfied with this machine. By the way, the 128GB SSD is a SK Hynix M.2, I may replace that eventually, I've only had it for about ten days. Okay review update time. I still love this machine, it's a little slow on battery but holds a charge well when using the Intel graphics adapter. I highly recommend the purchase, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Charle Cobalt

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this laptop very long but I love it. Handles games with ease and it's super fast. I don't understand what some people are saying about the fan being loud, my laptop is pretty quite and so far has only gotten warm - not hot, but that's an easy fix if it did. Battery life is great for normal use but I leave it plugged in for heavier use so cannot comment on how long it goes for gaming. All in all I think this is a GREAT little laptop. If you're expecting a tower pc you might be disappointed but no laptop compares to one. Good buy and I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth laptop. For years, I've struggled along with $300 computers. They were OK, nothing earth-shaking. Why would they be? You get what you pay for, as always. I'm not a "gamer" unless you count Disco Ducks. I realize my new Dell is for the "Call of Duty" type folks. But you know what? non-gamers will appreciate the crystal-clear graphics, and speed, speed, speed! Even with 3 or 4 instances open. Just a solid machine, and in my opinion, worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable, terrible drivers, can't play games well
customer_reviews.text: Most games get 1/2 of what was advertised. Drivers from dell work better for some games, worse for others. Something to do with the Max-Q drivers made by dell, nvidia, or microsoft. Customers wanting to play popular titles like BF1 aren't allowed because the company refuses to update drivers.... If the screen is adjusted the whole thing blue screens of death. Most problems arose 2 days after the return window elapsed. Wish I would have gone with one of the many competitors, I recommend avoiding this if at all possible--its not even that good of a deal anymore.
customer_reviews.author: D.F.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: What it does is great. Still wouldn't buy it again. First the keyboard went out, but I compensated by getting another keyboard. Then the fans stopped working properly. They would come on then go off. Tried to find a fix, nothing worked. Predictably the entire unit is now fried and I'm without while I shop for something better. I loved it while it worked, but the keyboards been out for a while, so this is a downer. If you do get this, get the service plan. Just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Safiyah Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good value gaming laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop for the price, loaded up and rating to go in about an hour or so after all the updates. Played overwatch on ultra settings with not much sacrifice on the Performance. Didn’t come with much bloatware too. Like the finish of the chassis.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wong

customer_reviews.title: Good Overall, One Major Flaw
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in 2017 and it served me well. Built extremely well, even survived a couple falls from 4 feet+. Performance was good, temps always remained in line. A smaller issue I had was the CPU not being able to keep up with the GPU but my main issue was the keyboard. The typing experience was fine but when a few keys stopped working it was about 60 screws to change the keyboard. Overall this system is really good but if the keyboard goes bad hope you still have your warranty
customer_reviews.author: Shervon Bertrand

customer_reviews.title: Almost 600 days since i bought my laptop and still loving it
customer_reviews.text: Almost 600 Days since I bought my Dell 7577 i5 8GB Ram GTX 1060 Max-Q and not a single problem, I am very happy with this laptop and hope to buy the next version that comes out, maybe even upgrade to a 4k then, the 1080p display is amazing and the build quality is solid, speakers have a ring on high volume with high frequencies but other than that its loud and clear, Fingerprint scanner never gave me a problem and is very responsive, altho I would recommend getting more than 8GB Ram and maybe upgrade storage if you are planning on downloading a lot
customer_reviews.author: RaymondvWyk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent temperatures
customer_reviews.text: The ones I liked the most: -Excellent temperatures compared to your competition GPU ~ 65 ° C CPU ~ 72 ° C playing The Witcher 3 without a ventilated base or anything. -Relation Price / Quality very good -And good battery life ~ 5 hours browsing / something from YouTube I did not like: -Mark of the screen VERY THICC -Weight of the team ~ 2.7kg - You could have a fan control software like Acer has in its Predator line
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Y.

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Had it in top-notch condition, running smoothly and plays all the games I throw at it. Its a Really good bang for your buck. But the color acuracy is not the best if you intend to do video editing
customer_reviews.author: Boh

customer_reviews.title: The laptop has great color and viewing angles for this price imo
customer_reviews.text: The laptop has great color and viewing angles for this price imo. I have a Dell U2410 (true IPS monitor), calibrated with a spyder 3 pro. With that said I am saying the laptop has a good screen for the money. The colors are fine, the RGB is fine, its all great for the price of the laptop imo. The keyboard is not a mechanical mx cherry switched keyboard, but its a not bad, I don't have any complaints personally with it. Ran a heaven benchmark on Extreme Preset and got a score of 1728, nothing overclocked. Played CS:GO, and Far Cry Primal, everything ran and played great.
customer_reviews.author: BrianG

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great laptop that cna handle most AAA titles at high - max settings. Now no, it is not compared to a 8700K 2x 1080ti in SLI becuase it is a laptop. A laptop that is above all the competition for its price. Recommendations -Upgrade to 16gb of ram (do it yourself so it can be cheaper!) -Either play with Vsync on or get a Gsync external monitior because screen tearing makes this laptop (or any laptop) an unpleasant experience
customer_reviews.author: monica reyes

customer_reviews.title: This laptop has defective keyboard with 1 W S X keys stop working
customer_reviews.text: I am using external keyboard to write this review since the keyboard on this DELL laptop is broken just over 1 year. $1000 dollar laptop from DELL just last that long. Peace out Dell. I would try another brand. It is not worth it the money to buy gaming laptop from Dell
customer_reviews.author: Nathan T

customer_reviews.title: Price to Performance Powerhouse
customer_reviews.text: The materials are cheap, no external aluminum. It's very heavy, the battery dies quickly, and uses integrated graphics without being plugged in. All of these things drastically bring down price, without sacrificing performance. For a 1060 (max-q) for this price, you make sacrifices, and that's really what you're buying anyway. Great if you know what you want.
customer_reviews.author: R3c0nf1gur3d

customer_reviews.title: Best value gaming laptop
customer_reviews.text: Awesome discrete gaming laptop that isn't flashy and ugly like most gaming laptops. Can play most modern games on ultra or high settings. And I'm able to use the original oculus rift perfectly on most games (the new rift S wont work on this laptop due to the usb-c being wired through the integrated graphics card)
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: My Perfect Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Everything is so amazing, I don’t even know what to say but please get this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: There are many better options at this price point for gaming laptops especially since its 2020. This model is old and the laptop itself overheats very quickly and the fan is very loud even for a gaming laptop. Ive only had this laptop for 8 months and its already dying on me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective, Crashes Constantly
customer_reviews.text: 4-5 different types of stop errors and crashes when playing simple games that should be well within the device's capabilities (Overwatch).
customer_reviews.author: Nick Wynne

customer_reviews.title: Excelent entry level gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: Wont let you hanging and can run most anything...for a while, it tends to overheat but i suspect that is because mine has a weird thermal paste job since my GF and i have the same model laptop and play mostly the same games but hers just wont melt and die in fire like mine...
customer_reviews.author: saul

customer_reviews.title: Audio jack DOA
customer_reviews.text: That's honestly the only negative thing about this laptop. But I bought it used and honestly it's not the big of a deal for me. Laptop is great and runs everything on high/ultra easily.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: Best laptop in the market for the price
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box it works perfectly. Great performance for the price, I'd even say this is the best bang-for-your-buck gaming laptop in the market. However, by no means does this machine feels cheap. While it doesn't possess RGB, or a 144 hz monitor, it's solidly constructed and feels premium though and through. The only slight annoyance that I’ve encountered is that the fan can get quite loud at times, but that's not enough to make me deduct a star. I thoroughly recommend this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Trns777

customer_reviews.title: Can finally use my Steam Library
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a laptop in a few years and the one I did have was literally the first iteration of Mac laptops. A black choking dinosaur that bit the dust as it should. I'm still getting used to this guy, but so far it's very awesome.Easy to work, fun to use, big ass screen, and I can finally game a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Nahaylem

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, huge bezels, low quality screen, slow and loud hard drive. I might as well carry around a desktop computer. The red was too much.
customer_reviews.author: Waffles

customer_reviews.title: Great computer for its price
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop for the price. Will run most games at decent play settings but I wouldn't try to push it too much. Dont expect to be able to use ultra settings but it will definately fjet the job done. The graphics card makes it good for things like 3D design/modeling.
customer_reviews.author: Besart

customer_reviews.title: Directional keys broken 2 months after buying.
customer_reviews.text: So, bought this in late February of 2018, by 4/17/18. Directional button like other reviews, was/is broken. Completely disappointing, Dell has dropped their standards apparently.
customer_reviews.author: Gunter

customer_reviews.title: the screen from the box has a dead pixel
customer_reviews.text: It operates good, battery last awhile unless its in performance mode, but the screen is the downside to this product, new out of the box it has a dead pixel (a spot on the screen that is never lit up) and is really annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Master tech.

customer_reviews.title: Has had some issues
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my sister as a gaming laptop, works well enough but she can't crank things up to stellar graphics without issues. Also has had to be sent in for repairs, has a start up issue. Pretty good for the price but for anyone super serious about gaming performance they might look for a bit more power.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: The laptop keys suck
customer_reviews.text: Other than that it's an amazing laptop. Just get one of those silicon covers.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: best gaming laptop you can buy for this price
customer_reviews.text: laptop is great. I love it. performance is amazing for this price. I totally recommend it to everyone pros: great specs great performance cooling is amazing SSD is really fast battery is pretty good cons: not the best screen(color accuracy isn't best and I wish it had more brightness) not the best speakers it has 2X4GB ram, would be better if it had 1X8gb windows 10 home is... it gives me errors on many games. I googled it and everyone says it's because some dll files are missing. I never had that problem on my other laptop,it has windows 10 pro
customer_reviews.author: shotiko javakhishvili

customer_reviews.title: this laptop is just awesome and the red backlight on the kb is easy ...
customer_reviews.text: So at the top of the LCD there is some light bleed, but otherwise, after putting in a bigger ssd and a 2tb 2.5: hdd, this laptop is just awesome and the red backlight on the kb is easy on the eyes in the night.
customer_reviews.author: spicyramenTT

customer_reviews.title: Non-flashy decent gaming notebook
customer_reviews.text: Personally, I had problems with another notebook from this manufacturer in the past, they behave as "too-big-to-care-to-customers", their online service is especially awful for a tech manufacturer. But all that said, this notebook is excellent, beautiful design, fancy-looking, with an impressive combination of a 7th gen i5 CPU and the awesome GTX 1060 VGA. Decent gaming notebook without those flashy edges, red lights, and silly "annihilator" names. Fingers crossed to never need their customer support again...
customer_reviews.author: Paulo Moraes

customer_reviews.title: Graphics Card issue
customer_reviews.text: This is the message I got after trying to update to the latest GeForce drivers “Windows has stopped this device because it has reported problems. (Code 43). Multiple phone calls to Dell and multiple reinstallalations of drivers have done nothing to help this issue. My graphics card simply isn’t working
customer_reviews.author: Fabrizio

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product great entry level is able to handle ark survival and battlefield 1 will be adding a vibe to it VR very fast . Surprisingly its a Dell
customer_reviews.author: dude

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what hubby and I needed. He plays games on it and I use it for my crafting studio. No problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: direction button was broken
customer_reviews.text: everything gone well during importing to Turkey, but laptop itself too loud when u r playing any game... And one ot the direction button (down) was broken! and not working well
customer_reviews.author: Ozgur Dalkiran

customer_reviews.title: Laptop fans get pretty loud during gaming so headphones are an absolute must
customer_reviews.text: I bought it when it was on sale for about $897 so that made it even more worth it. Laptop fans get pretty loud during gaming so headphones are an absolute must. I've only played a few games so far (PUBG, Overwatch, Civ 6) but they've all been able to run at high-ultra with no problems. Fan noise is mostly non-existent during normal use (web browsing, creating office documents, etc). Laptop fans keep the system pretty at a good core temp during gaming. Overall fantastic laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop for the price. It shipped and was here quick. Ordered for my wife for college and it plays anything I throw at it on med. to high settings.
customer_reviews.author: James Breeden

customer_reviews.title: the computer is excellent and I love the only thing that sometimes bothers ...
customer_reviews.text: the computer is excellent and I love the only thing that sometimes bothers a little is that the keys have to be pressed a little hard and sometimes the screen is pasted when you connect a device or you open something but not in the game sessions is excellent only those two small details but super recommended
customer_reviews.author: Robinson Prada

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I was so shook when I got this computer for the price it was such a steal. The panel isn't the best but that's where the price compromise is and I can live with it. This has been my main gaming machine for abour a year and it has not let me down
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good budget gaming laptop
customer_reviews.text: So far its been a great laptop. Wife pretty much set it up and got her games going without much help and the games (ESO and FO4) look & play great. Good budget gaming laptop. Edit: Taking a star due to bad specs in the listing, we love it and it works great with our high demand games, but it doesn't have the same ports listed which is causing some issues until we get a splitter/hub. Its short at least one USB port and I think one other type, but I'm going to check it against the listing again when I get home tonight to see what else.
customer_reviews.author: HiGravity

customer_reviews.title: I really recommand to buy this laptop.
customer_reviews.text: Simply its so powerful and provides great performance with games at ultra for example GTA V, Cod WWII, Fortnite and The Division. The laptopn is always cool and at low tempreatue even at high load (playing games). The only problem is that its so loud but thats not a big deal as its a laptop and the fans produce loud sound to keep the device cool. Finally i would really suggest anyone buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamad

customer_reviews.title: This is my old gaming laptop but the one i use is identical.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is amazing. Handles High demanding games on High-ultra (EX. ARK, Battlefield, Battlefront, etc.) with 60 fps typically. Great gaming laptop, 10/10, Ive seen laptops with these same specs go for thousands of dollars. The one I use today has very, very similar specs but I believe it has a different processor, I upgraded a while ago but to be honest I really see no difference in performance so I might've wasted 1000 dollars but that's unrelated. This is definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Just a Hentai enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop for a casual gamer on a budget
customer_reviews.text: Updating after half a year. It's still going strong and can handle most games without getting too hot or having the fan go crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop. It can run PUBG
customer_reviews.text: Good laptop. It can run PUBG, but the noise is very loud. The color of the screen is not very correct. If you want to use it do some photoshop, you need an extra screen.
customer_reviews.author: Xiao Kai

customer_reviews.title: One of the best laptops I have used in my life
customer_reviews.text: One of the best laptops I have used in my life. Although, it has frozen two times so far(not something major, just a few secs, it's some bug I guess). My recommendation is that, as soon as you get it, you should update the divers and the BIOS If possible, to avoid some performance troubles.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop for the price
customer_reviews.text: Im loving so it far, i can play the same games my other buddies with there High end PCs can. Al though, im having heating ussies, this is probably a really isolated case since im the only one in the reviews thats having this problem. So yeah, some bad luck for me.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Juvera

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great, amazing, and fast laptop for the price. Just got it and loving it so far, will update it in about a month or so.

customer_reviews.title: wow and others without any problem as well as edit photos and videos and for a very good
customer_reviews.text: ideal pc gamer I can play lol, wow and others without any problem as well as edit photos and videos and for a very good price

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Crashing
customer_reviews.text: The computer is great when its working but this is the 4th time this has crashed on me. I do heavy video editing and the specs should be able to support it but for some reason keeps crashing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent build, airflow and attractive design
customer_reviews.text: I like almost everything about the build quality and design. The airflow is really good. I just don't like the arrow keys. Also, I didn't know that gaming laptops don't perform well on battery, due to the high wattage required by the hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Tippy

customer_reviews.title: Best budget laptop out there!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome laptop!! I was a little skeptical of it only coming with 8gbs of RAM but it ran PUBG (on guest wifi) without the power supply perfectly!! Would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Cromwell

customer_reviews.title: One of the best budget gaming laptop
customer_reviews.text: One of the best budget gaming laptop. It can run any AAA game on high setting and it didn't make any loud noise and overheat for a long gaming session. The only downside is the bottom left of the laptop is a bit pointy and I always bump my arm when gaming.
customer_reviews.author: jade

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend the 4k display if you can afford it
customer_reviews.text: As advertised by seller. For the laptop itself, I would highly recommend the 4k display if you can afford it. Otherwise, this is a pretty good gaming rig for the pricepoint. Very good cooling, Consistent performance.

customer_reviews.title: A bit overpriced
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit too expensive and often experiences lag so overall you should look elsewhere

customer_reviews.title: Loved everything about this machine
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about this machine. Apart from the heating up above the keyboard (don't know if all laptops do that or not) 7577 met all my expectations

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: I have the computer now for a while and it has functioned well.

customer_reviews.text: Runs as it should, keeps really cool for a gaming pc. I recommend reinstalling the operating system first before using.

customer_reviews.text: This computer was good for the price. And I would recommend waiting till the price goes to 800-900 area. This computer can run any intense game With ease but might need more ram.

customer_reviews.text: This laptop ship all the way from California to Manila. I got this package last Wednesday, December 20. My first impression on this laptop -- you can spot screen bleeding near the camera. Too bad, I can't easily ship it back for replacement. I guess, I have to live with it. Overall I like the build of the laptop.

customer_reviews.text: You're getting a GTX 1060 6GB for under $1000 (not sure if the price is applicable as of this review).

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for my first gaming laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great choice for my first gaming laptop. Crisp clean resolution and audio and this might be my excitement clouding me but i think my internet even runs faster on it.. Amazing battery life when not gaming (about 6 hours while i was downloading stuff) And while i game with my charger plugged in, even without it the battery life is pleasant. Its fast and powerful for my most played games like PUBG and EFT which are moderatly demanding games. LED lit keyboard makes typing at night effortlessly and the brightness of the computer can be turned down. A great all rounder laptop with more than enough bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Stephon

customer_reviews.title: Best gaming laptop at less the $1
customer_reviews.text: Best gaming laptop at less the $1,000. Really like this because it has plenty of storage, gtx 1060 gpu plus a thunderbolt 3 port. Will have the possibility to use external gpu in the future if I want to.

customer_reviews.title: Screen quality
customer_reviews.text: Screen absolutely is not good. Viewing angles, color accuracy or brightness.

customer_reviews.text: Died after 2 months. Can't be repaired as I lived outside of the US.

customer_reviews.title: For the Price it cant be beat.
customer_reviews.text: For the Price you cant beat this Machine! Max-Q Laptops are usually at least $1600, this model does it for less. Even at 100% load on GPU/CPU temps never passed 60. Machine is very quiet. The cooling is very efficient. The machine is stealth black with red accents that You don't pay the i7 tax. For Hyper Threading and .2ghz in Turbo Mode. Not worth paying $200 for 10% improvement is certain programs. Save that money and get more RAM. Build Quality is Premium. Just from holding it you can tell its a High End Machine.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice computer! I am very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipment, well packt. Very nice computer! I am very happy with this product

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice machine. My only issue is that the display ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice machine. My only issue is that the display casing is weak. I feel I need to be extra careful when opening the laptop. Besides that though I love it. Plays my games well and doesn't look gaudy like so many other gaming laptops. If you are looking for game performance Gamer_Chris23 has done a bunch of videos on youtube.

customer_reviews.title: Best Laptop for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought it about 2-3 weeks ago and I honestly cant find any thing wrong with the laptop great build quality, great specs. maybe the battery is not that great (only 5 hours of browsing and streaming videos ) but overall great gaming experience for the price :)

Also screen is so bad and there is same problem like other customers. There is white side when the screen is black . Its located under webcam. It is totally waste of money.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy gaming laptop
customer_reviews.text: Nice gaming laptop.Very very heavy .Came on time and in good packing.Still configuring it .Will update the post and tell more about pros and cons next week.
customer_reviews.author: Pranay kr

customer_reviews.title: The laptop is great, but all the storage i have availible to ...
customer_reviews.text: The laptop is great, but all the storage i have availible to me is 64GB. Is anyone else having this problem?
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality but very poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality but very poor battery life. If you're looking to get this model go with the i7 version.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It has a very good video card
customer_reviews.text: It has a very good video card. But it doesn't have dvd rom and vga port. The empty unused space on the left and right of the screen is also not so nice. Touch pad not so smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Martin D.

customer_reviews.title: worst than my 300 dollar latop screen
customer_reviews.text: The screen is awful, worst than my 300 dollar latop screen. Why all the specs if the screen is limited? The computer freezes often, just seems sluggish. Now that i bought it and used it, doubt i can return for my money back. Anyways now its sitting in my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Dell Laptop - 7th Gen Intel Core i5, GTX 1060 6GB Graphics, 8GB Memory, 128GB SSD + 1TB HDD, 15.6", Matte Black
